subject: Re: [junit] JUnit tests in plain English
msgSnippet: ... That was my initial reaction, then I read the documentation a little more and David mentions that he found some pinch points with Fit and so created
messageBody:
On 09/11/2007, Ilja Preuss <it@...> wrote:
>
> Did you take a look at Fit/FitNesse?
>
> Your Concordian seems to go in a very similar direction...
>
> Cheers, Ilja

That was my initial reaction, then I read the documentation a little
more and David mentions that he found some pinch points with Fit and
so created Concordian. I've not used Fit enough to have felt the same
pinch points, so I can't comment on the reasons for creating
Concordian. So for me, it's just something else that goes in a bucket
of things to look at in more depth when I get a spare five minutes!

Cheers,

James
